amendment.description: Amendment increases the amount of funding for Supportive Services for Veterans Families by $2 million offset by a reduction of a similar amount in the funding for the VA's Information Technology Systems.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section to the end of the bill revising amounts provided by the bill by reducing the amount made available for Department of Veterans Affairs- Departmental Administration- Information Technology Services and by increasing the amount made available for Veterans Health Administration- Medical Services by $2,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A021) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
